prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that has vibrant green scales and fiery red spikes along its back.
I want a Pokemon with a unique body shape that combines features of both dinosaurs and dragons.
Generate an image of a fierce-looking Pokemon that has a bright yellow belly and sharp claws.
Make a Pokemon that stands tall with a powerful stance, featuring bold colors and striking facial features.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous regions, showcasing a mix of green and red hues.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature, complete with a robust tail and colorful spines.
Show me an intimidating Pokemon that embodies the spirit of both land and sky with its dynamic features.
